inputs.name: sourcesDirectory
inputs.label: Sources Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root directory of your sources.

inputs.name: testAssembly
inputs.label: Test Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test binaries to run tests on. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**\*test*.dll;-:**\obj\**` for all dlls with test in name while excluding files in any sub-directory named obj.

inputs.name: testFiltercriteria
inputs.label: Test Filter criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional criteria to filter tests from Test assemblies. For example: Priority=1|Name=MyTestMethod

inputs.name: runSettingsFile
inputs.label: Run Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to runsettings file to use with the tests. Use `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)` to access the Project folder.

inputs.name: dotCoverFilters
inputs.label: dotCover Filter criteria
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional criteria to filter what dotCover considers.

inputs.name: disableCodeCoverage
inputs.label: Disable dotCover
inputs.helpMarkDown: Disable dotCover. Run tests without coverage.

inputs.name: vsTestVersion
inputs.label: Test platform version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Visual Studio test to use.

inputs.name: vstestLocation
inputs.label: Path to vstest.console.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to VSTest.

inputs.name: testAdapterPath
inputs.label: Path to Custom Test Adapters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory path to custom test adapters. For example, `$(build.SourcesDirectory)\packages`.

inputs.name: testAdditionalCommandLine
inputs.label: Additional VSTest Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other Console options that can be passed to vstest.console.exe. See [MSDN](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj155796.aspx) for more information.

inputs.name: dotCoverAdditionalCommandLine
inputs.label: Additional dotCover Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Other Console options that can be passed to dotcover.exe. See [dotCover Usage](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/dotcover/dotCover__Console_Runner_Commands.html) for more information.

inputs.name: toolsBaseDirectory
inputs.label: Path where tools are located
inputs.helpMarkDown: The base directory where dotCover tools are located (e.g. `$(build.sourcesDirectory)\packages`).

inputs.name: enableDotCoverLog
inputs.label: Enable dotCover logfile
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, dotCover creates a logfile which will be placed at `$(Build.SourcesDirectory)\dotCover.log`.

inputs.name: nunit3MultiAssemblyWorkAround
inputs.label: Enable Workaround for NUnit 3 tests with multiple assemblies
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, each detected test assembly runs in a separate vstest call. The code coverage results will then be merged, each test run creates an individual trx file.

inputs.name: testSeriesInfo
inputs.label: Test Series
inputs.helpMarkDown: Gives information whether the test series contains out of multiple test tasks or not. If so, the code coverage results of all tasks will be aggregated into one by the last task of the series.

options.multi1: Multiple test tasks series, not last one
options.multi2: Last test task in a test task series

inputs.name: testRunTitle
inputs.label: Test Run Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a name for the Test Run.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platform against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for platform in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration against which the tests should be reported. If you have defined a variable for configuration in your build task, use that here.

inputs.name: publishRunAttachments
inputs.label: Upload Test Attachments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Opt in/out of publishing test run level attachments.
